issue.title: nbviewer.jupyter.org cannot read interactive charts of my ipynb file
issue.body:
# Troubleshooting

## Describe your environment

* Operating system:
* Python version:
* Hardware:
* Internet access:
* Jupyter notebook or not? [Y/N]:Y
* Which chapter of book?:

## Describe your question
Nbviewer.jupyter.org cannot read all interactive charts of my ipynb file which can run successfully on the jupyter environment.

Image1:It runs successfully on the jupyter environment----
![wechatimg835](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42913830/48947044-c37b2700-ef6a-11e8-9ec4-2305273e0509.jpeg)

Image2:Ooops on the Nbviewer.jupyter.org----
![wechatimg834](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42913830/48947135-1ce35600-ef6b-11e8-9f46-1f4c28ec41f9.jpeg)

comment.body:
pili gave me this solution, and it worked in my last bar chart.
This is my [coding:](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/CCCCCecilia/python-data-assignments/blob/master/assignment2/assignment2.ipynb)

> For the pyecharts rendering problem, you can try the following steps:
> 
> Save the chart to standalone HTML files.
> Use the from IPython.display import IFrame way to load it into your notebook.

issue.title: problem about Pyecharts
issue.body:
* Operating system:MAC OS
* Python version:3.7.0
* Jupyter notebook or not? [Y/N]:Y
* Which chapter of book?:WEEK9


##question 1: I draw a chart with Pyecharts. It can show in my Jupyter notebook, but cannot show when I use GitHub or https://nbviewer.jupyter.org to view it.
![1542813440113](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43194916/48851335-bed93600-ede5-11e8-98e5-62ab83a7aebd.jpg)
![1542813694854](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43194916/48851345-c7317100-ede5-11e8-8322-6fa35bad6ad6.jpg)

##another question: how can I change the color and theme of charts to keep all the charts color harmonious?

comment.body:
> @CCCCCecilia can you show the working solution and help @ChicoXYC to merge into the FAQ? Thanks.

OK.

issue.title: problem about Pyecharts
issue.body:
* Operating system:MAC OS
* Python version:3.7.0
* Jupyter notebook or not? [Y/N]:Y
* Which chapter of book?:WEEK9


##question 1: I draw a chart with Pyecharts. It can show in my Jupyter notebook, but cannot show when I use GitHub or https://nbviewer.jupyter.org to view it.
![1542813440113](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43194916/48851335-bed93600-ede5-11e8-98e5-62ab83a7aebd.jpg)
![1542813694854](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43194916/48851345-c7317100-ede5-11e8-8322-6fa35bad6ad6.jpg)

##another question: how can I change the color and theme of charts to keep all the charts color harmonious?

comment.body:
> For the pyecharts rendering problem, you can try the following steps:
> 
> 1. Save the chart to standalone HTML files.
> 2. Use the `from IPython.display import IFrame` way to load it into your notebook.
> 
> Reference to the map in my recent [open rice map visualisation](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/hupili/openrice-data-blog-201811/blob/master/12.%20Sichuan%20Map.ipynb)
> 
> Please let us know if this works.

I tried this solution and it worked. Now the chart can show on nbviewer, but still cannot show on GitHub .

issue.title: about scraping
issue.body: 在抓取虾米网站数据时，会不定时出现禁止访问的问题。在网上找到的解决方案是要更换headers中的cookie, 有效但是要人为更换， 请问有没有其他的解决方法来解决该问题?

comment.body:
> > ##question 1: I draw a chart with Pyecharts. It can show in my Jupyter notebook, but cannot show when I use GitHub or https://nbviewer.jupyter.org to view it.
> 
> Can you show the notebook link for our online testing? [more](https://github.com/hupili/python-for-data-and-media-communication-gitbook/blob/master/pro-tips.md#asking-questions-like-a-pro)
> https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/CCCCCecilia/python-data-assignments/blob/master/assignment2/assignment2.ipynb
> > ##another question: how can I change the color and theme of charts to keep all the charts color harmonious?
> 
> Is this helpful? http://pyecharts.org/#/zh-cn/charts_style

issue.title: about scraping
issue.body: 在抓取虾米网站数据时，会不定时出现禁止访问的问题。在网上找到的解决方案是要更换headers中的cookie, 有效但是要人为更换， 请问有没有其他的解决方法来解决该问题?

comment.body:
@ChicoXYC here [https://github.com/CCCCCecilia/python-data-assignments/blob/master/assignment1/assignment1.ipynb](url) `import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import time import csv base_url = "https://www.xiami.com/search?key=" headers = { 'authority': 'www.xiami.com', 'upgrade-insecure-requests': '1', 'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_0) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/70.0.3538.77 Safari/537.36', 'accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8', 'referer': 'https://www.xiami.com/artist/top-O9fc383?spm=0.0.0.0.OC7hVH', 'accept-encoding': 'gzip, deflate, br', 'accept-language': 'zh-CN,zh;q=0.9', 'cookie': '_uab_collina=154164839983364920692646; gid=154164548545184; PHPSESSID=3366038599e8126a51651882df8c106b; join_from=1zufSNtP6D010%2FjCCA; _xiamitoken=301a978ededcf778bc37949e5fb12191; _unsign_token=095abebc279a7d4b9558d8d378bbbf20; user_from=1; UM_distinctid=166f13b4b1ee21-0ed62f08a435d-1e396652-13c680-166f13b4b1f8e8; cna=1NNhFGAjzx0CAZ62vkePvgvJ; xm_expect_legacy=1; CNZZDATA921634=cnzz_eid%3D333370432-1541643654-null%26ntime%3D1541650739; CNZZDATA2629111=cnzz_eid%3D972414053-1541641074-null%26ntime%3D1541651595; x5sec=7b22617365727665723b32223a223565646430643734363238323339623466663635313334396531396439343430434d754c6a393846454c726576654f766f7179633377453d227d; isg=BNLSiKt63Y7z6SFyaCs543S0I550S9YREKVEbJwrxgVwr3OphHOejRhNGks2vU4V', } def get_albums_url(singer_name): r = requests.get(base_url+singer_name+"&pos=1",headers=headers) html_str = r.text soup = BeautifulSoup(html_str,"html.parser") albums = soup.find_all("a",attrs = {"class":"song"}) for album in albums: ablum_name = album['title'] print(ablum_name) album_url = album["href"] get_songs_url("https:" + album_url, singer_name) def get_songs_url(album_url,singer_name): r = requests.get(album_url, headers=headers) html_str = r.text soup = BeautifulSoup(html_str, "html.parser") songs_td = soup.find_all("td", attrs={"class": "song_name"}) for song_td in songs_td: song = song_td.find("a") # song_name = song.text # print(song_name) song_url = song["href"] get_song_info(song_url,singer_name) def get_song_info(song_url,singer_name): r = requests.get("https://www.xiami.com"+song_url,headers=headers) html_str = r.text soup = BeautifulSoup(html_str, "html.parser") title = soup.find("div",{"id":"title"}).find("h1").text song_infos = soup.find("table",{"id":"albums_info"}).find_all("tr") arranger = "" singer = "" writer = "" composer = "" for i in range(0,len(song_infos)): if i ==0: album = song_infos[i].find("a").text elif i==1: singer = song_infos[i].find("a").text elif i==2: writer = song_infos[i].find("div").text elif i==3: composer = song_infos[i].find("div").text elif i==4: arranger = song_infos[i].find("div").text try: lyric = soup.find("div",{"class":"lrc_main"}).text.replace("
"," ") except Exception as e: return music_count = soup.find("div", {"class": "music_counts"}).text.split("\n") share_num = music_count[3][:-2] comm_num = music_count[4][:-2] content = [title, album, lyric, singer, writer, composer, arranger, share_num, comm_num] print(content) with open(singer_name+'.csv', 'a', newline='',encoding="utf-8") as csvfile: mywriter = csv.writer(csvfile) mywriter.writerow(content) def main(): singers_name = ['周杰伦' , "陈奕迅" , '林俊杰' , '林宥嘉'] for singer_name in singers_name: with open(singer_name+'.csv', 'w', newline='',encoding="utf-8") as csvfile: mywriter = csv.writer(csvfile) header = ["歌名", "专辑名","歌词", "演唱", "作词", "作曲", "编曲","分享数","评论数"] mywriter.writerow(header) print(singer_name) get_albums_url(singer_name) main() `

issue.title: about scraping
issue.body: 在抓取虾米网站数据时，会不定时出现禁止访问的问题。在网上找到的解决方案是要更换headers中的cookie, 有效但是要人为更换， 请问有没有其他的解决方法来解决该问题?
